Feeding your babycommon are wearing a too-tight 
bra, missing a feed, or a blow 
to the breast. It’s important 
that you deal with a blocked 
duct as soon as possible so 
that it doesn’t lead to mastitis 
(inflammation	of	the	breast).
If you have mastitis, your 
breasts will feel hot and 
tender. You may see a red 
patch of skin which is painful 
to touch. You can feel quite 
ill,	as	if	you	have	flu,	and	you	
may have a temperature. This 
can happen very suddenly. It
